title: Quarterly Text Analysis Extraction Schema
description: Schema for extracted structured data from quarterly text analysis

summary.description: Summary description of the company's business model

initiatives.description: List of strategic initiatives leading to growth

bullet_points.description: 2-4 bullet points highlighting progress on this initiative for the current quarter

items.description: A bullet point describing measurable progress on the initiative

changes.description: List of changes since last quarter

sentence.description: One sentence describing what has changed

headline_bullets.description: Up to 3 bullet points representing the most significant accomplishments or failures for the quarter, to be displayed on the quarter headline tile

text.description: The bullet point text describing the accomplishment or failure

indicator.description: Indicator showing whether this is an accomplishment (up) or failure (down)

quarterly_highlights.description: Quarterly highlights section containing 1-2 paragraphs and bullet points summarizing the quarter's key developments in accessible language
